def find_max_subsegment(vals, L, R):
    L += 1
    R -= 1
    s = 0
    xr = 0
    for i in range(L, R + 1):
        s += vals[i]
        xr ^= vals[i]
    f = s - xr
    (l, r) = (L, L)
    (ml, mr) = (L, R)
    (curs, curxr) = (0, 0)
    while r <= R:
        curs += vals[r]
        curxr ^= vals[r]
        if curs - curxr == f:
            while l < r and curs - vals[l] - (curxr ^ vals[l]) == f:
                curs -= vals[l]
                curxr ^= vals[l]
                l += 1
            if mr - ml > r - l:
                (mr, ml) = (r, l)
        r += 1
    return (ml + 1, mr + 1)
